Title: Rusty Nail
Description:
['Rusty Nail is a X Japan's anime music video produced by CLAMP and included on VHS as a first press bonus for the "PERFECT BEST' compilation album, released in 1999.', '
', '
', '
', '
The video shows anime versions of the band: YOSHIKI, ToshI, hide, PATA and HEATH in a sci-fi like scenario.', '
', '
', '
', '
(Source: Music Japan Plus / X Japan Wiki)']
